subject: Football
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Sex Crimes
Child Abuse and Neglect
Colleges and Universities
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: The Penn State assistant coach Mike McQueary, a central figure in the sexual abuse scandal that has roiled the university, was placed on administrative leave.
snippet: The Penn State assistant coach Mike McQueary, a central figure in the sexual abuse scandal that has roiled the university, was placed on administrative leave.
